question.answer: Foodzilla is a recipe searching website where you can find tonnes of recipes retrieved by an API
Quick notes is a feature wherein you can store your temporary notes in your dashboard while preparing a recipe and you have the option to store it on the database or keep it temporary.
Using social features, you can add friends on Foodzilla and see what they are cooking currently or what they are upto!

question.query: Can I submit my own recipe?
question.answer: Yes, you can submit your own recipe and it will be stored on our database.

question.query: Can I create account for free?
question.answer: Yes, it is and always will be free.
